A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very much a mixed film for me\, and as someone who enjoyed Force Awakens and Rogue One\, that's saying something. Even a second viewing didn't improve my opinion. Instead\, it only deepened the problems from my initial viewing. And with multiple people I know having similar issues with the film\, it's clear I'm not just imagining things. The more I think about it\, the worst it seems to get.
